code: // START SNIPPET: e1 private Exchange createLetter() {     Exchange exchange = context.getEndpoint("direct:a").createExchange().     Message msg = exchange.getIn().     msg.setHeader("firstName", "Claus").     msg.setHeader("lastName", "Ibsen").     msg.setHeader("item", "Camel in Action").     msg.setBody("PS: Next beer is on me, James").     return exchange. }

@Test public void testFreemarkerLetter() throws Exception {     MockEndpoint mock = getMockEndpoint("mock:result").     mock.expectedMessageCount(1).     mock.message(0).body().contains("Dear Ibsen, Claus").     mock.message(0).body().contains("Thanks for the order of Camel in Action.").     template.send("direct:a", createLetter()).     mock.assertIsSatisfied(). }

protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:a").to("freemarker:org/apache/camel/component/freemarker/letter.ftl").to("mock:result").         }     }. }
